main event: A civilian observed an unidentified object in the sky near Xenia, Ohio, on 29 April 1952.
interesting points: The object was initially described as having a brilliant red spot in the center and then turned to a hazy blue., The sighting lasted for approximately 45 minutes., The object was reported while being viewed with binoculars., The location was about 300 feet east of a residence near Beaver Creek School House., There were multiple conclusions drawn regarding the nature of the sighting, including it possibly being a balloon or aircraft.
sighted object: an unidentified object with a brilliant red center
witness description: A civilian who reported the sighting and observed it with binoculars.
